name: 20 Questions Game
discri: A classic guessing game where one player thinks of an object, and the other players have up to 20 yes-or-no questions to guess what it is. It encourages critical thinking, deduction, and creativity. Perfect for gatherings, road trips, or just passing the time with friends and family.
maxTime: This exciting kids party will give your child a birthday of memories and fun picnic games for just
